Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); if ( this.link and GetItemInfo(this.link) ) then GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(this.link) GameTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnClick: if IsShiftKeyDown() and ChatFrameEditBox:IsVisible() and this.link and GetItemInfo(this.link) then ChatFrameEditBox:Insert("|c"..this.color.."|H"..this.link.."|h["..this.item.."]|h|r") end
if MerRTFrame:IsShown() then MerRTFrame:Hide() else MerRTFrame:Show() end
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if (arg1 == "RightButton") then if IsShiftKeyDown() then this:StartMoving(); else MerRT.OptionsOnClick() end end
